text:
Has this happened to anyone? For some reason when I click on the Global Header of my theme (to edit it) the header doesn't appear once I'm in the Global Editor.

It's _possible_ I deleted the section containing the global header by accident at some point? :thinking_face:

Anyone have an idea on how to get the Global Header back? I haven't published the update so the header still exists on the site, it's only "missing" when I attempt to edit it in the Global Editor
Yes, this has happened to many of our customers, I can get you a HS Support ticket number for reference
Thanks <@U03AKL6Q1B2> :pray::skin-tone-3: I call HubSpot support today with this info
You're welcome, here is another thread with more info <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CFPRTEGTX/p1674848239666509>
